greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: Number of signed permutations of length 2n invariant under D and D'bar.
comment: See section 6 in the Hardt reference.
link: Harvey P. Dale, Table of n, a(n) for n = 0..661
Andy Hardt, Justin M. Troyka, Restricted Symmetric Signed Permutations, Department of Mathematics, Carleton College, 2013.
example: For n = 1, the permutations of length 2 are (-1, 2) and (1, -2).
program: (PARI) seq(n)={my(v=vector(n+1)); v[1]=1; v[2]=2; for(n=2, n, v[n+1] = 2*v[n] + 4*(n-1)*v[n-1]); v} \\ _Andrew Howroyd_, Dec 08 2018
results.author: _Andy Hardt_, Aug 04 2011
ext: Terms a(6) and beyond from _Andrew Howroyd_, Dec 08 2018
